Name: Sagres
About the game: The Early Access version only supports Korean. Stay tuned for the full version! About the game In 1480, as a Portuguese explorer, you set out to find your missing father. You will travel around the world to gather information and discover forgotten civilizations, myths, and ruins in the process. As you explore, you can sail, battle, and mini-games, recruit characters from all over the world as your companions, and customize your own ships. Find a legendary find. The year 1480 is the age of discovery. Achieve artifacts, myths, relics and geographic discoveries from around the world. Defend yourself from historical and mythical threats. Beware of forces that stand in your way, from the famous Mamluks and Janissaries, Jaguar warriors and Ottoman Turk pirates. In lesser-known places on Earth, even mythical threats like the Kraken can be found. Not easy to find. Each of the finds has a reason why it hasn't been discovered until now. Overcome hardships and achieve discoveries through mini-games. Hire a capable navigator. Traveling the world is impossible on your own. Find talented sailors from around the world and hire them to be your companions. Customize the ship to your liking. Want to easily win battles? Add more cannons! You can customize your ship as many times as you want.
